body:
Comment 6: 
Marin: Sorry, don't take it badly.  When you posted the code, it felt like you
were not aware of this long-standing discussion.

fullung: I had seen this, but monitoring for some time didn't seem to show any
significant memory use.  I'm now wondering a bit, though.. it looks like godoc
may spike in memory usage rapidly, so that may well be the issue.

I'm gonna take a machine with more memory, and mark it as a duplicate for now.
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #1511._
